content: Good day, Baihu Li. Thank you for coming to see the apartment. As a landlord, I want to ensure that I am getting the best possible rental price for this property. May I ask what your budget is for renting this apartment?

content: 1000 dollars per month. I am a student and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I am also responsible and dependable. I am looking for the lowest possible rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Thank you for letting me know your budget, Baihu Li. As a landlord, I want to make sure that I am getting the best possible rental price for this property. That being said, I am willing to negotiate with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement.

Based on the size of the apartment and its location, I believe that a monthly rental price of 1200 dollars would be appropriate. However, I am open to discussing different options with you.

What are your thoughts on this rental price? Do you have any other questions or concerns that I can address?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
1200 dollars is too high. I am looking for the lowest possible rental price. I am a student and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I am also responsible and dependable.

I am willing to negotiate with you.

I agree to the price of 1000 dollars per month.
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Baihu Li. I appreciate your understanding and I am glad that we were able to come to an agreement that works for both of us.

I am pleased to inform you that I have accepted your offer of 1000 dollars per month as the rental price for this apartment. I am confident that you will be a responsible and dependable tenant and I look forward to having you as my tenant.
